Unfold configuration
--------------------

.. -unfold-

To include the Unfold custom theme for Django Admin Site, adds the ``--unfold`` option
to the general djpro project creation command:

.. code-block:: shell

   djpro project YOUR-PROJECT-NAME --unfold

.. note::

   Change ``YOUR-PROJECT-NAME`` to your project name.
   Find your unfold configuration in ``settings_base``.

* `Learn more about Unfold <https://unfoldadmin.com/docs/installation/quickstart/>`_

.. -end-unfold-
